activities.name: CreateTables
activities.description: Create Tables etl-oracle database in azure

scripts.text:
CREATE TABLE HR_JOBS (
  JOB_ID NVARCHAR(100),
  JOB_TITLE NVARCHAR(35) NOT NULL,
  MIN_SALARY FLOAT,
  MAX_SALARY FLOAT,
  SRC_ROW_INSERT_TSTMP DATETIME2,
  WATERMARK_VALUE NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
  FILE_TABLE_ID INTEGER,
  BATCH_ID INTEGER,
  SRC_TBL_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  PIPLN_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  ROW_VERSION TIMESTAMP,
  INSERT_TSTMP_IST DATETIME2 DEFAULT SYSDATETIME() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'India Standard Time',
  PRIMARY KEY (JOB_ID)
);

CREATE TABLE HR_REGIONS (
  REGION_ID NVARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  REGION_NAME NVARCHAR(25),
  SRC_ROW_INSERT_TSTMP DATETIME2,
  WATERMARK_VALUE NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
  FILE_TABLE_ID INTEGER,
  BATCH_ID INTEGER,
  SRC_TBL_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  PIPLN_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  ROW_VERSION TIMESTAMP,
  INSERT_TSTMP_IST DATETIME2 DEFAULT SYSDATETIME() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'India Standard Time',
  PRIMARY KEY (REGION_ID)
);

CREATE TABLE HR_COUNTRIES (
  COUNTRY_ID NVARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  COUNTRY_NAME NVARCHAR(40),
  REGION_ID FLOAT,
  SRC_ROW_INSERT_TSTMP DATETIME2,
  WATERMARK_VALUE NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
  FILE_TABLE_ID INTEGER,
  BATCH_ID INTEGER,
  SRC_TBL_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  PIPLN_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  ROW_VERSION TIMESTAMP,
  INSERT_TSTMP_IST DATETIME2 DEFAULT SYSDATETIME() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'India Standard Time',
  PRIMARY KEY (COUNTRY_ID)
);

CREATE TABLE HR_LOCATIONS (
  LOCATION_ID NVARCHAR(100),
  STREET_ADDRESS NVARCHAR(40),
  POSTAL_CODE NVARCHAR(12),
  CITY NVARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
  STATE_PROVINCE NVARCHAR(25),
  COUNTRY_ID CHAR(2),
  SRC_ROW_INSERT_TSTMP DATETIME2,
  WATERMARK_VALUE NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
  FILE_TABLE_ID INTEGER,
  BATCH_ID INTEGER,
  SRC_TBL_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  PIPLN_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  ROW_VERSION TIMESTAMP,
  INSERT_TSTMP_IST DATETIME2 DEFAULT SYSDATETIME() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'India Standard Time',
  PRIMARY KEY (LOCATION_ID)
);

CREATE TABLE HR_DEPARTMENTS (
  DEPARTMENT_ID NVARCHAR(100),
  DEPARTMENT_NAME NVARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
  MANAGER_ID INT,
  LOCATION_ID INT,
  SRC_ROW_INSERT_TSTMP DATETIME2,
  WATERMARK_VALUE NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
  FILE_TABLE_ID INTEGER,
  BATCH_ID INTEGER,
  SRC_TBL_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  PIPLN_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  ROW_VERSION TIMESTAMP,
  INSERT_TSTMP_IST DATETIME2 DEFAULT SYSDATETIME() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'India Standard Time',
  PRIMARY KEY (DEPARTMENT_ID)
);

CREATE TABLE HR_EMPLOYEES (
  EMPLOYEE_ID NVARCHAR(100),
  FIRST_NAME NVARCHAR(20),
  LAST_NAME NVARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
  EMAIL NVARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
  PHONE_NUMBER NVARCHAR(20),
  HIRE_DATE DATETIME NOT NULL,
  JOB_ID NVARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  SALARY DECIMAL(8,2),
  COMMISSION_PCT DECIMAL(2,2),
  MANAGER_ID INT,
  DEPARTMENT_ID INT,
  SRC_ROW_INSERT_TSTMP DATETIME2,
  WATERMARK_VALUE NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
  FILE_TABLE_ID INTEGER,
  BATCH_ID INTEGER,
  SRC_TBL_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  PIPLN_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  ROW_VERSION TIMESTAMP,
  INSERT_TSTMP_IST DATETIME2 DEFAULT SYSDATETIME() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'India Standard Time',
  PRIMARY KEY (EMPLOYEE_ID),
  UNIQUE (EMAIL),
  CHECK (salary > 0)
);

CREATE TABLE HR_JOB_HISTORY (
  EMPLOYEE_ID NVARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  START_DATE DATETIME NOT NULL,
  END_DATE DATETIME NOT NULL,
  JOB_ID NVARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  DEPARTMENT_ID INT,
  SRC_ROW_INSERT_TSTMP DATETIME2,
  WATERMARK_VALUE NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
  FILE_TABLE_ID INTEGER,
  BATCH_ID INTEGER,
  SRC_TBL_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  PIPLN_NM NVARCHAR(100),
  ROW_VERSION TIMESTAMP,
  INSERT_TSTMP_IST DATETIME2 DEFAULT SYSDATETIME() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'India Standard Time',
  PRIMARY KEY (EMPLOYEE_ID, START_DATE),
  CHECK (end_date > start_date)
);
